ModMetaData.name: Muriden - Xenotype Project
ModMetaData.author: DanZinagri
ModMetaData.description:
Muriden - From Muris (Latin for Mouse).
I like the ratkin mods and the themes it adds, but i've been a bit burned by how hefty HAR and the various race mods can get on a heavily modded setup. While i've seen a attempt or two at a general biotech conversion they felt a little base-level and many didn't recapture theire smaller size. Thus i wanted to make a mod to not only add in a similar type, but also tie it in with the big and small framework. As such i hope to make a ground-up rework of the "ratkin" theme and even add my own spin to it.
What is added: Muriden - Effectively the baseliner of this ratkin-esk race. Sciurus - A fast but fragile squirrel subtype (name continuiing with the latin theme). Dirtmole - Patched to be a subtype of Muriden, gaining more of the traits of the Muriden while still retaining the benefits of the dirtmole. (didn't change the name to try and limit compatability issues). A Medieval-Tier faction called the Muriden Kingdom (currently able to spawn Muriden and Dirtmoles)
Future Plans: New equipment Hostile faction New Xenotypes Equipment for higher tech levels VFE Medieval and Medieval Overhaul integration special Muriden Warcaskets
I'm learning modding this stuff as I go so for now this mod will be mostly XML changes, but maybe someday i'll actually read up on the C# modding side if i run into something i can't achieve with XML changes.
I will continue to try and make improvements on the textures as well.
